title: A Level Sociology - Case Studies & Life Histories
description: Richard looks at case studies a life histories for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, he will look at the advantages and disadvantages of using life histories and case studies. Ideal for preparing for your A Level Sociology exam. For more info visit www.senecalearning.com
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
